text: Ibrahim Garba is a Nigerian Academician , geologist and former Vice Chancellor of Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria. He was also the former Vice Chancellor of the Kano State University of Science and Technology (KUST), Wudil. == Education == He holds bachelor's degree & master's degree in Geology from Ahmadu Bello University and PhD in Imperial College London. == Career == Garba began his career at Ahmadu Bello University where he later took secondment at the Federal Ministry of Mines and Steel Development, Abuja as Director- General, Nigeria Mining Cadastre Office. == References == Category:Nigerian academics Category:Geologists Category:1957 births Category:Living people
